title: Rushworth’s Easter Festival - bigger and better than ever!
abstract: Great organisation, perfect weather conditions and post-COVID enthusiasm - all conspired to ensure the 2022 Rushworth Easter Heritage Festival was a resounding success.  The record crowd came from far and wide to enjoy market stalls, displays and novelty events — and of course the return of the Festival Parade after a two year hiatus. See more photos by local photographer Sharon Perry on pages 2-3.
